reviewText:
One of my favorite Chow Yun-Fat comedies and further proof of what a great all
around actor he is.

This is one of his older movies but if you like it you should watch these ones also:

100 Ways to Murder your Wife
Fractured Follies
Spiritual Love
Diary of a Big Man

I'm glad I bought the DVD. Never get tired of watching Chow Yun-Fat & Carol 'DoDo' Cheng!!! They have an amazing and unbeatable chemistry. I still couldn't get over Man in the Net. Highly recommend watching it! You will laugh at Chow Yun-fat and Jacky Cheung
